Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

Sushi Rice 0.5 cup
Water 0.5 cup
Apple Cider Vinegar 1 Tbsp
Seasoned Rice Vinegar 1 Tbsp
Salt 0.375 tsp
Sugar 0.5 Tbsp
Avacado 1 unit
Soy Sauce 1 unit
Salmon 0.25 pound
Seaweed 1 unit

320 calories (Apple Cider Vinegar/Seasoned Rice Vinegar/Salt/Sugar/Avacado/Soy Sauce/Salmon/Seaweed Data Missing)

20 sodium (Apple Cider Vinegar/Seasoned Rice Vinegar/Salt/Sugar/Avacado/Soy Sauce/Salmon/Seaweed Data Missing)

0 cost (Sushi Rice/Apple Cider Vinegar/Seasoned Rice Vinegar/Salt/Sugar/Avacado/Soy Sauce/Salmon/Seaweed Data Missing)

0 sugar (Sushi Rice/Apple Cider Vinegar/Seasoned Rice Vinegar/Salt/Sugar/Avacado/Soy Sauce/Salmon/Seaweed Data Missing)

6 protein (Apple Cider Vinegar/Seasoned Rice Vinegar/Salt/Sugar/Avacado/Soy Sauce/Salmon/Seaweed Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 57 Minutes

Rinse ½ cup Sushi Rice under water for 2 minutes
Timer 2 minutes Let rice air dry
Put Sushi Rice in instantpot
Put ½ cup Water in instantpot
Timer 2 minutes Let rice air dry
Timer 12 minutes Cook rice in instant pot on low pressure
Timer 10 minutes Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve
Put 1 Tbsp Apple Cider Vinegar in glass bowl
Put 1 Tbsp Seasoned Rice Vinegar in glass bowl
Put .375 tsp Salt in glass bowl
Put ½ Tbsp Sugar in glass bowl
Timer 1 minute Micowave for one minute then stir
Combine vinegar bowl with Sushi Rice
Timer 30 minutes Cover mixture in tinfoil with poked holes and set in fridge
Cook ¼ pound Salmon on all sides briefly, about 2 min
Spoon Sushi Rice on Seaweed leaving about an inch of seaweed uncovered
Spread out rice with spoon
Put Avacado and Salmon in the middle of the Sushi Rice
Tightly wrap and wet the uncovered inch of seaweed and overlap the roll
Put water on the outside of the uncovered seaweed aswell so it sticks
Optionally, if the rice is still warm, put rolls into freezer for 5 min
Dip in Soy Sauce
